title: How to Make Pigs in the Blanket with Bisquick

steps.headline: Make the biscuit dough following the Bisquick biscuit dough recipe.
steps.description: Or use your favorite biscuit dough recipe.

steps.headline: Cut the dough into 4 x 3-inch oblong shapes.
Wrap each hot dog with the dough making sure to leave the hot dogs peeking out.
Bake the Pigs in the Blankets for 15 minutes or until golden brown.

text: Preheat oven to 450 °F (232 °C).  Make the biscuit dough following the Bisquick biscuit dough recipe. Or use your favorite biscuit dough recipe. Cut the dough into 4 x 3-inch oblong shapes.  Wrap each hot dog with the dough making sure to leave the hot dogs peeking out.  Bake the Pigs in the Blankets for 15 minutes or until golden brown.  Finished.
